◆ _IsWithinDist()

bool WorldObject::_IsWithinDist ( WorldObject const *  obj,
float  dist2compare,
bool  is3D,
bool  useBoundingRadius = true 
) const
privatevirtual

Reimplemented in GameObject.

1207{
1208 float sizefactor = useBoundingRadius ? GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize() : 0.0f;
1209 float maxdist = dist2compare + sizefactor;
1210
1211 if (m_transport && obj->GetTransport() && obj->GetTransport()->GetGUID() == m_transport->GetGUID())
1212 {
1213 float dtx = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX;
1214 float dty = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY;
1215 float disttsq = dtx * dtx + dty * dty;
1216 if (is3D)
1217 {
1218 float dtz = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ;
1219 disttsq += dtz * dtz;
1220 }
1221 return disttsq < (maxdist * maxdist);
1222 }
1223
1224 float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1225 float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1226 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1227 if (is3D)
1228 {
1229 float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1230 distsq += dz * dz;
1231 }
1232
1233 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1234}

◆ AddToNotify()

void WorldObject::AddToNotify ( uint16  f)
2979{
2980 if (!(m_notifyflags & f))
2981 if (Unit* u = ToUnit())
2982 {
2983 if (f & NOTIFY_VISIBILITY_CHANGED)
2984 {
2985 uint32 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetVisibilityNotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 1000;
2986
2987 uint32 diff = getMSTimeDiff(u->m_last_notify_mstime, GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count());
2988 if (diff >= EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY / 2)
2989 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY /= 2;
2990 else
2991 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY -= diff;
2992 u->m_delayed_unit_relocation_timer = EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY;
2993 u->m_last_notify_mstime = GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() + EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY - 1;
2994 }
2995 else if (f & NOTIFY_AI_RELOCATION)
2996 {
2997 u->m_delayed_unit_ai_notify_timer = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetAINotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 500;
2998 }
2999
3000 m_notifyflags |= f;
3001 }
3002}

◆ CanDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  ignoreStealth,
bool  checkClient,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private
1881{
1882 WorldObject const* seer = this;
1883
1884 // Pets don't have detection, they use the detection of their masters
1885 if (Unit const* thisUnit = ToUnit())
1886 if (Unit* controller = thisUnit->GetCharmerOrOwner())
1887 seer = controller;
1888
1889 if (obj->IsAlwaysDetectableFor(seer) || GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER) // xinef: World Trigger can detect all objects, used for wild gameobjects without owner!
1890 return true;
1891
1892 if (!ignoreStealth)
1893 {
1894 if (!seer->CanDetectInvisibilityOf(obj)) // xinef: added ignoreStealth, allow AoE spells to hit invisible targets!
1895 {
1896 return false;
1897 }
1898
1899 if (!seer->CanDetectStealthOf(obj, checkAlert))
1900 {
1901 // xinef: ignore units players have at client, this cant be cheated!
1902 if (checkClient)
1903 {
1904 if (!IsPlayer() || !ToPlayer()->HaveAtClient(obj))
1905 return false;
1906 }
1907 else
1908 return false;
1909 }
1910 }
1911
1912 return true;
1913}

#define WORLD_TRIGGER

◆ CanDetectInvisibilityOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectInvisibilityOf ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
private
1916{
1917 uint32 mask = obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
1918 // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
1919 mask |= obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibility.GetFlags();
1920
1921 // Check for not detected types
1922 if (mask != obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags())
1923 return false;
1924
1925 // It isn't possible in invisibility to detect something that can't detect the invisible object
1926 // (it's at least true for spell: 66)
1927 // It seems like that only Units are affected by this check (couldn't see arena doors with preparation invisibility)
1928 if (obj->ToUnit())
1929 {
1930 // Permanently invisible creatures should be able to engage non-invisible targets.
1931 // ex. Skulking Witch (20882) / Greater Invisibility (16380)
1932 bool isPermInvisibleCreature = false;
1933 if (Creature const* baseObj = ToCreature())
1934 {
1935 auto auraEffects = baseObj->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY);
1936 for (auto const effect : auraEffects)
1937 {
1938 if (SpellInfo const* spell = effect->GetSpellInfo())
1939 {
1940 if (spell->GetMaxDuration() == -1)
1941 {
1942 isPermInvisibleCreature = true;
1943 }
1944 }
1945 }
1946 }
1947
1948 if (!isPermInvisibleCreature)
1949 {
1950 uint32 objMask = m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
1951 // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
1952 objMask |= m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags();
1953 if (objMask != m_invisibility.GetFlags())
1954 return false;
1955 }
1956 }
1957
1958 for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES; ++i)
1959 {
1960 if (!(mask & (1 << i)))
1961 continue;
1962
1963 // xinef: visible for the same invisibility type:
1964 if (m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)) && obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)))
1965 continue;
1966
1967 int32 objInvisibilityValue = obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
1968 int32 ownInvisibilityDetectValue = m_invisibilityDetect.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
1969
1970 // Too low value to detect
1971 if (ownInvisibilityDetectValue < objInvisibilityValue)
1972 return false;
1973 }
1974
1975 return true;
1976}
int32
std::int32_t int32
Definition: Define.h:103
InvisibilityType
InvisibilityType
Definition: SharedDefines.h:1254
TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES
@ TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES
Definition: SharedDefines.h:1268

@ SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY

◆ CanDetectStealthOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectStealthOf ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private
1979{
1980 // Combat reach is the minimal distance (both in front and behind),
1981 // and it is also used in the range calculation.
1982 // One stealth point increases the visibility range by 0.3 yard.
1983
1984 if (!obj->m_stealth.GetFlags())
1985 return true;
1986
1987 // dead players shouldnt be able to detect stealth on arenas
1988 if (isType(TYPEMASK_PLAYER))
1989 if (!ToPlayer()->IsAlive())
1990 return false;
1991
1992 float distance = GetExactDist(obj);
1993 float combatReach = 0.0f;
1994
1995 if (IsUnit())
1996 combatReach = ((Unit*)this)->GetCombatReach();
1997
1998 if (distance < combatReach)
1999 return true;
2000
2001 if (!HasInArc(M_PI, obj))
2002 return false;
2003
2004 for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES; ++i)
2005 {
2006 if (!(obj->m_stealth.GetFlags() & (1 << i)))
2007 continue;
2008
2009 if (IsUnit())
2010 if (((Unit*)this)->HasAuraTypeWithMiscvalue(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, i))
2011 return true;
2012
2013 // Starting points
2014 int32 detectionValue = 30;
2015
2016 // Level difference: 5 point / level, starting from level 1.
2017 // There may be spells for this and the starting points too, but
2018 // not in the DBCs of the client.
2019 detectionValue += int32(getLevelForTarget(obj) - 1) * 5;
2020
2021 // Apply modifiers
2022 detectionValue += m_stealthDetect.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2023 if (obj->isType(TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT))
2024 {
2025 detectionValue += 30; // pussywizard: increase detection range for gameobjects (ie. traps)
2026 if (Unit* owner = ((GameObject*)obj)->GetOwner())
2027 detectionValue -= int32(owner->getLevelForTarget(this) - 1) * 5;
2028 }
2029
2030 detectionValue -= obj->m_stealth.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2031
2032 // Calculate max distance
2033 float visibilityRange = float(detectionValue) * 0.3f + combatReach;
2034
2035 Unit const* unit = ToUnit();
2036
2037 // If this unit is an NPC then player detect range doesn't apply
2038 if (unit && unit->IsPlayer() && visibilityRange > MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE)
2039 visibilityRange = MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE;
2040
2041 if (checkAlert)
2042 visibilityRange += (visibilityRange * 0.08f) + 1.5f;
2043
2044 Unit const* targetUnit = obj->ToUnit();
2045
2046 // If checking for alert, and creature's visibility range is greater than aggro distance, No alert
2047 if (checkAlert && unit && unit->ToCreature() && visibilityRange >= unit->ToCreature()->GetAttackDistance(targetUnit) + unit->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance)
2048 return false;
2049
2050 if (distance > visibilityRange)
2051 return false;
2052 }
2053
2054 return true;
2055}
StealthType
StealthType
Definition: SharedDefines.h:1246
TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES
@ TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES
Definition: SharedDefines.h:1250
SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
@ SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
Definition: SpellAuraDefines.h:291
TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT
@ TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT
Definition: ObjectGuid.h:51
TYPEMASK_PLAYER
@ TYPEMASK_PLAYER
Definition: ObjectGuid.h:50
MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE
#define MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE
Definition: Unit.h:625
Creature::GetAttackDistance
float GetAttackDistance(Unit const *player) const
Definition: Creature.cpp:3594
Creature::m_CombatDistance
float m_CombatDistance
Definition: Creature.h:371
GameObject
Definition: GameObject.h:120
Object::IsUnit

Definition: Object.h:205

Definition: Object.h:125

Definition: Object.h:518
WorldObject::m_stealth

Definition: Object.h:517
WorldObject::getLevelForTarget

Definition: Object.h:498
Position::GetExactDist

Definition: Position.h:177

Definition: Position.cpp:141

References Creature::GetAttackDistance(), Position::GetExactDist(), FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetFlags(), getLevelForTarget(), FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetValue(), Position::HasInArc(), Object::IsPlayer(), Object::isType(), Object::IsUnit(), Creature::m_CombatDistance, m_stealth, m_stealthDetect, MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE, SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, Object::ToCreature(), Object::ToPlayer(), TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES, Object::ToUnit(), TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT, and TYPEMASK_PLAYER.

◆ CanNeverSee()

bool WorldObject::CanNeverSee ( WorldObject const *  obj) const

1874{
1875 if (IsCreature() && obj->IsCreature())

1878}

◆ CanSeeOrDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanSeeOrDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  ignoreStealth = false,
bool  distanceCheck = false,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
1727{
1728 if (this == obj)
1729 return true;
1730
1731 if (obj->IsNeverVisible() || CanNeverSee(obj))
1732 return false;
1733
1734 if (obj->IsAlwaysVisibleFor(this) || CanAlwaysSee(obj))
1735 return true;
1736
1737 // Creature scripts
1738 if (Creature const* cObj = obj->ToCreature())
1739 {
1740 if (Player const* player = ToPlayer())
1741 {
1742 if (cObj->IsAIEnabled && !cObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(player))
1743 {
1744 return false;
1745 }
1746
1747 ConditionList conditions = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForNotGroupedEntry(CONDITION_SOURCE_TYPE_CREATURE_VISIBILITY, cObj->GetEntry());
1748 if (!sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions((WorldObject*)this, (WorldObject*)obj, conditions))
1749 {
1750 return false;
1751 }
1752 }
1753 }
1754
1755 // Gameobject scripts
1756 if (GameObject const* goObj = obj->ToGameObject())
1757 {
1758 if (ToPlayer() && !goObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(ToPlayer()))
1759 {
1760 return false;
1761 }
1762 }
1763
1764 // pussywizard: arena spectator
1765 if (obj->IsPlayer())
1766 if (((Player const*)obj)->IsSpectator() && ((Player const*)obj)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena())
1767 return false;
1768
1769 bool corpseVisibility = false;
1770 if (distanceCheck)
1771 {
1772 bool corpseCheck = false;
1773 WorldObject const* viewpoint = this;
1774 if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1775 {
1776 if (Creature const* creature = obj->ToCreature())
1777 {
1778 if (TempSummon const* tempSummon = creature->ToTempSummon())
1779 {
1780 if (tempSummon->IsVisibleBySummonerOnly() && GetGUID() != tempSummon->GetSummonerGUID())
1781 {
1782 return false;
1783 }
1784 }
1785 }
1786
1787 if (thisPlayer->isDead() && thisPlayer->GetHealth() > 0 && // Cheap way to check for ghost state
1788 !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST))
1789 {
1790 if (Corpse* corpse = thisPlayer->GetCorpse())
1791 {
1792 corpseCheck = true;
1793 if (corpse->IsWithinDist(thisPlayer, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1794 if (corpse->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1795 corpseVisibility = true;
1796 }
1797 }
1798
1799 // our additional checks
1800 if (Unit const* target = obj->ToUnit())
1801 {
1802 // xinef: don't allow to detect vehicle accessory if you can't see vehicle base!
1803 if (Unit const* vehicle = target->GetVehicleBase())
1804 if (!thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(vehicle))
1805 return false;
1806
1807 // pussywizard: during arena preparation, don't allow to detect pets if can't see its owner (spoils enemy arena frames)
1808 if (target->IsPet() && target->GetOwnerGUID() && target->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && GetGUID() != target->GetOwnerGUID())
1809 if (BattlegroundMap* bgmap = target->FindMap()->ToBattlegroundMap())
1810 if (Battleground* bg = bgmap->GetBG())
1811 if (bg->GetStatus() < STATUS_IN_PROGRESS && !thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(target->GetOwnerGUID()))
1812 return false;
1813 }
1814
1815 if (thisPlayer->GetViewpoint())
1816 viewpoint = thisPlayer->GetViewpoint();
1817
1818 if (thisPlayer->GetFarSightDistance() && !thisPlayer->isInFront(obj))
1819 {
1820 return false;
1821 }
1822 }
1823
1824 // Xinef: check reversely obj vs viewpoint, object could be a gameObject which overrides _IsWithinDist function to include gameobject size
1825 if (!corpseCheck && !viewpoint->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), true))
1826 return false;
1827 }
1828
1829 // GM visibility off or hidden NPC
1830 if (!obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1831 {
1832 // Stop checking other things for GMs
1833 if (m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1834 return true;
1835 }
1836 else
1837 return m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM) >= obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM);
1838
1839 // Ghost players, Spirit Healers, and some other NPCs
1840 if (!corpseVisibility && !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST)))
1841 {
1842 // Alive players can see dead players in some cases, but other objects can't do that
1843 if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1844 {
1845 if (Player const* objPlayer = obj->ToPlayer())
1846 {
1847 if (thisPlayer->GetTeamId() != objPlayer->GetTeamId() || !thisPlayer->IsGroupVisibleFor(objPlayer))
1848 return false;
1849 }
1850 else
1851 return false;
1852 }
1853 else
1854 return false;
1855 }
1856
1857 if (obj->IsInvisibleDueToDespawn())
1858 return false;
1859
1860 // pussywizard: arena spectator
1861 if (this->IsPlayer())
1862 if (((Player const*)this)->IsSpectator() && ((Player const*)this)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && (obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() || obj->m_stealth.GetFlags()))
1863 return false;
1864
1865 if (!CanDetect(obj, ignoreStealth, !distanceCheck, checkAlert))
1866 {
1867 return false;
1868 }
1869
1870 return true;
1871}
SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM
@ SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM

void WorldObject::DestroyForNearbyPlayers ( )

2945{
2946 if (!IsInWorld())
2947 return;
2948

2951 Acore::PlayerListSearcherWithSharedVision<Acore::AnyPlayerInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(this, targets, check);
2952 Cell::VisitWorldObjects(this, searcher, GetVisibilityRange());
2953 for (std::list<Player*>::const_iterator iter = targets.begin(); iter != targets.end(); ++iter)
2954 {
2955 Player* player = (*iter);
2956
2957 if (player == this)
2958 continue;
2959
2960 if (!player->HaveAtClient(this))
2961 continue;
2962
2963 if (IsUnit() && ((Unit*)this)->GetCharmerGUID() == player->GetGUID())
2964 continue;
2965
2966 DestroyForPlayer(player);
2967 player->m_clientGUIDs.erase(GetGUID());
2968 }
2969}

bool WorldObject::GetClosePoint ( float &  x,

bool  force = false 
) const
2700{
2701 // angle calculated from current orientation
2702 GetNearPoint(forWho, x, y, z, size, distance2d, GetOrientation() + angle);
2703
2704 if (std::fabs(this->GetPositionZ() - z) > 3.0f || !IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2705 {
2706 x = this->GetPositionX();
2707 y = this->GetPositionY();
2708 z = this->GetPositionZ();
2709 if (forWho)
2710 if (Unit const* u = forWho->ToUnit())
2711 u->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2712 }
2713 float maxDist = GetObjectSize() + size + distance2d + 1.0f;
2714 if (GetExactDistSq(x, y, z) >= maxDist * maxDist)
2715 {
2716 if (force)
2717 {
2718 x = this->GetPositionX();
2719 y = this->GetPositionY();
2720 z = this->GetPositionZ();
2721 return true;
2722 }
2723 return false;
2724 }
2725 return true;
2726}

◆ GetDistanceOrder()

bool WorldObject::GetDistanceOrder ( WorldObject const *  obj1,
WorldObject const *  obj2,
bool  is3D = true 
) const
1382{
1383 float dx1 = GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX();
1384 float dy1 = GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY();
1385 float distsq1 = dx1 * dx1 + dy1 * dy1;
1386 if (is3D)
1387 {
1388 float dz1 = GetPositionZ() - obj1->GetPositionZ();
1389 distsq1 += dz1 * dz1;
1390 }
1391
1392 float dx2 = GetPositionX() - obj2->GetPositionX();
1393 float dy2 = GetPositionY() - obj2->GetPositionY();
1394 float distsq2 = dx2 * dx2 + dy2 * dy2;
1395 if (is3D)
1396 {
1397 float dz2 = GetPositionZ() - obj2->GetPositionZ();
1398 distsq2 += dz2 * dz2;
1399 }
1400
1401 return distsq1 < distsq2;
1402}

References Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by Acore::ObjectDistanceOrderPred::operator()(), and Spell::SearchChainTargets().

◆ GetDistanceZ()

float WorldObject::GetDistanceZ ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
1199{
1200 float dz = std::fabs(GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ());
1201 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1202 float dist = dz - sizefactor;
1203 return (dist > 0 ? dist : 0);
1204}

References GetObjectSize(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by Creature::CanStartAttack(), and npc_pet_hunter_snake_trap::MoveInLineOfSight().

Position WorldObject::GetFirstCollisionPosition ( float  destX,
float  destY,
float  destZ 
)
2839{
2840 Position pos = GetPosition();
2841 auto distance = GetExactDistSq(destX,destY,destZ);
2842

2844 auto dy = destY - pos.GetPositionY();
2845
2846 auto ang = std::atan2(dy, dx);
2847 ang = (ang >= 0) ? ang : 2 * M_PI + ang;
2848
2849 MovePositionToFirstCollision(pos, distance, ang);
2850 return pos;
2851}

Position WorldObject::GetFirstCollisionPosition ( float  startX,
float  startY,
float  startZ,
float  destX,
float  destY 
)
2824{
2825 auto dx = destX - startX;
2826 auto dy = destY - startY;
2827

2829 ang = (ang >= 0) ? ang : 2 * M_PI + ang;

2831
2832 auto distance = pos.GetExactDist2d(destX,destY);
2833

2835 return pos;

◆ GetHitSpherePointFor() [2/2]

Position WorldObject::GetHitSpherePointFor ( Position const &  dest,
Optional< float >  collisionHeight = { },
Optional< float >  combatReach = { } 
) const
1237{
1238 G3D::Vector3 vThis(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ() + (collisionHeight ? *collisionHeight : GetCollisionHeight()));
1239 G3D::Vector3 vObj(dest.GetPositionX(), dest.GetPositionY(), dest.GetPositionZ());
1240 G3D::Vector3 contactPoint = vThis + (vObj - vThis).directionOrZero() * std::min(dest.GetExactDist(this), (combatReach ? *combatReach : GetCombatReach()));
1241
1242 return Position(contactPoint.x, contactPoint.y, contactPoint.z, GetAngle(contactPoint.x, contactPoint.y));
1243}

◆ GetMinHeightInWater()

float WorldObject::GetMinHeightInWater ( ) const

Get the minimum height of a object that should be in water to start floating/swim.

Returns
float
1544{
1545 // have a fun with Archimedes' formula
1546 auto height = GetCollisionHeight();
1547 auto width = GetCollisionWidth();
1548 auto weight = getWeight(height, width, 1040); // avg human specific weight
1549 auto heightOutOfWater = getOutOfWater(width, weight, 10202) * 4.0f; // avg human density
1550 auto heightInWater = height - heightOutOfWater;
1551 return (height > heightInWater ? heightInWater : (height - (height / 3)));
1552}
getWeight

Get the height immersed in water.

◆ GetNearPoint()

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float &  z,
float  searcher_size,
float  distance2d,
float  absAngle,
float  controlZ = 0,
Position const *  startPos = nullptr 
) const
2627{
2628 GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle, startPos);
2629 z = GetPositionZ();
2630
2631 if (searcher)
2632 {
2633 if (Unit const* unit = searcher->ToUnit(); Unit const* target = ToUnit())
2634 {
2635 if (unit && target && unit->IsInWater() && target->IsInWater())
2636 {
2637 // if the searcher is in water
2638 // we have no ground so we can
2639 // set the target height to the
2640 // z-coord to keep the searcher
2641 // at the correct height (face to face)
2642 z += GetCollisionHeight() - unit->GetCollisionHeight();
2643 }
2644 }
2645 searcher->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2646 }
2647 else
2648 {
2649 UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2650 }
2651
2652 // if detection disabled, return first point
2653 if (!sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_DETECT_POS_COLLISION))
2654 return;
2655
2656 // return if the point is already in LoS
2657 if (!controlZ && IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2658 return;
2659
2660 // remember first point
2661 float first_x = x;
2662 float first_y = y;
2663 float first_z = z;
2664
2665 // loop in a circle to look for a point in LoS using small steps
2666 for (float angle = float(M_PI) / 8; angle < float(M_PI) * 2; angle += float(M_PI) / 8)
2667 {
2668 GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle + angle, startPos);
2669 z = GetPositionZ();
2670 UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2671 if (controlZ && fabsf(GetPositionZ() - z) > controlZ)
2672 continue;
2673
2674 if (IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2675 return;
2676 }
2677
2678 // still not in LoS, give up and return first position found
2679 if (startPos)
2680 {
2681 x = searcher->GetPositionX();
2682 y = searcher->GetPositionY();
2683 z = searcher->GetPositionZ();
2684 }
2685 else
2686 {
2687 x = first_x;
2688 y = first_y;
2689 z = first_z;
2690 }
2691}

◆ GetNearPoint2D() [2/2]

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint2D ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float  distance,
float  absAngle,
Position const *  startPos = nullptr 
) const
2590{
2591 float effectiveReach = GetCombatReach();
2592
2593 if (searcher)
2594 {
2595 effectiveReach += searcher->GetCombatReach();
2596
2597 if (this != searcher)
2598 {
2599 float myHover = 0.0f, searcherHover = 0.0f;
2600 if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
2601 myHover = unit->GetHoverHeight();
2602 if (Unit const* searchUnit = searcher->ToUnit())
2603 searcherHover = searchUnit->GetHoverHeight();
2604
2605 float hoverDelta = myHover - searcherHover;
2606 if (hoverDelta != 0.0f)
2607 effectiveReach = std::sqrt(std::max(effectiveReach * effectiveReach - hoverDelta * hoverDelta, 0.0f));
2608 }
2609 }
2610
2611 float positionX = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionX() : GetPositionX();
2612 float positionY = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionY() : GetPositionY();
2613
2614 x = positionX + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::cos(absAngle);
2615 y = positionY + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::sin(absAngle);
2616
2617 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(x);
2618 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(y);
2619}

◆ GetRandomPoint() [2/2]

void WorldObject::GetRandomPoint ( const Position &  srcPos,
float  distance,
float &  rand_x,
float &  rand_y,
float &  rand_z 
) const
1503{
1504 if (!distance)
1505 {
1506 pos.GetPosition(rand_x, rand_y, rand_z);
1507 return;
1508 }
1509
1510 // angle to face `obj` to `this`
1511 float angle = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(2 * M_PI);
1512 float new_dist = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(distance);
1513
1514 rand_x = pos.m_positionX + new_dist * cos(angle);
1515 rand_y = pos.m_positionY + new_dist * std::sin(angle);
1516 rand_z = pos.m_positionZ;
1517
1518 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(rand_x);
1519 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(rand_y);
1520 UpdateGroundPositionZ(rand_x, rand_y, rand_z); // update to LOS height if available
1521}

1678 if (target)
1679 {
1680 if (target->IsVisibilityOverridden() && target->IsCreature())
1681 {
1682 return *target->m_visibilityDistanceOverride;
1683 }
1684 else if (target->IsGameObject())
1685 {
1686 if (IsInWintergrasp() && target->IsInWintergrasp())
1687 {
1688 return VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP + VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS;
1689 }
1690 else if (target->IsVisibilityOverridden())
1691 {
1692 return *target->m_visibilityDistanceOverride;
1693 }
1694 else if (ToPlayer()->GetCinematicMgr()->IsOnCinematic())
1695 {
1696 return DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE;
1697 }
1698 else
1699 {
1700 return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange() + VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS;
1701 }
1702 }
1703
1704 return IsInWintergrasp() && target->IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1705 }
1706 return IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1707 }
1708 else if (ToCreature())
1709 {
1710 return ToCreature()->m_SightDistance;
1711 }
1712 else
1713 {
1714 return SIGHT_RANGE_UNIT;
1715 }
1716 }
1717
1718 if (ToDynObject() && isActiveObject())
1719 {
1720 return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1721 }
1722
1723 return 0.0f;
1724}
SIGHT_RANGE_UNIT
#define SIGHT_RANGE_UNIT
Definition: ObjectDefines.h:32
VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS
#define VISIBILITY_INC_FOR_GOBJECTS
Definition: ObjectDefines.h:28

◆ IsInBetween()

bool WorldObject::IsInBetween ( WorldObject const *  obj1,
WorldObject const *  obj2,
float  size = 0 
) const
1471{
1472 if (!obj1 || !obj2)
1473 return false;
1474
1475 if (!size)
1476 size = GetObjectSize() / 2;
1477
1478 float pdist = obj1->GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) + size / 2.0f;
1479 if (GetExactDist2dSq(obj1) >= pdist || GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) >= pdist)
1480 return false;
1481
1482 if (G3D::fuzzyEq(obj1->GetPositionX(), obj2->GetPositionX()))
1483 return GetPositionX() >= obj1->GetPositionX() - size && GetPositionX() <= obj1->GetPositionX() + size;
1484
1485 float A = (obj2->GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY()) / (obj2->GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX());
1486 float B = -1;
1487 float C = obj1->GetPositionY() - A * obj1->GetPositionX();
1488 float dist = std::fabs(A * GetPositionX() + B * GetPositionY() + C) / std::sqrt(A * A + B * B);
1489 return dist <= size;
1490}
Position::GetExactDist2dSq
float GetExactDist2dSq(const float x, const float y) const
Definition: Position.h:156

References Position::GetExactDist2dSq(), GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), and Position::GetPositionY().

Referenced by TwilightCutterSelector::operator()().

◆ IsInRange()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange ( WorldObject const *  obj,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange,
bool  is3D = true 
) const
1405{
1406 float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1407 float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1408 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1409 if (is3D)
1410 {
1411 float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1412 distsq += dz * dz;
1413 }
1414
1415 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1416
1417 // check only for real range
1418 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1419 {
1420 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1421 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1422 return false;
1423 }
1424
1425 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1426 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1427}

References GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by SmartScript::GetTargets(), npc_anachronos_the_ancient::npc_anachronos_the_ancientAI::HandleAnimation(), FarthestTargetSelector::operator()(), SmartScript::ProcessEvent(), npc_varian_wrynn::npc_varian_wrynnAI::UpdateAI(), npc_thrall_bfu::npc_thrall_bfuAI::UpdateAI(), boss_grand_champion::boss_grand_championAI::UpdateAI(), and boss_gathios_the_shatterer::UpdateAI().

◆ IsInRange2d()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange2d ( float  x,
float  y,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange 
) const
1430{
1431 float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1432 float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1433 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1434
1435 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize();
1436
1437 // check only for real range
1438 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1439 {
1440 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1441 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1442 return false;
1443 }
1444
1445 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1446 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1447}

◆ IsInRange3d()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange3d ( float  x,
float  y,
float  z,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange 
) const
1450{
1451 float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1452 float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1453 float dz = GetPositionZ() - z;
1454 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
1455
1456 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize();
1457
1458 // check only for real range
1459 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1460 {
1461 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1462 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1463 return false;
1464 }
1465
1466 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1467 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1468}

Optional< float >  collisionHeight = { },

) const
1348{
1349 if (!IsInMap(obj))
1350 return false;
1351
1352 float ox, oy, oz;
1353 if (obj->IsPlayer())
1354 {
1355 obj->GetPosition(ox, oy, oz);
1356 oz += obj->GetCollisionHeight();
1357 }
1358 else
1359 obj->GetHitSpherePointFor({ GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ() + (collisionHeight ? *collisionHeight : GetCollisionHeight()) }, ox, oy, oz);
1360

1362 if (IsPlayer())
1363 {
1364 GetPosition(x, y, z);
1365 z += GetCollisionHeight();
1366 }
1367 else
1368 GetHitSpherePointFor({ obj->GetPositionX(), obj->GetPositionY(), obj->GetPositionZ() + obj->GetCollisionHeight() }, x, y, z, collisionHeight, combatReach);
1369
1370 return GetMap()->isInLineOfSight(x, y, z, ox, oy, oz, GetPhaseMask(), checks, ignoreFlags);

◆ MovePosition()

void WorldObject::MovePosition ( Position &  pos,
float  dist,
float  angle,
bool  disableWarning = false 
)
2777{
2778 angle += GetOrientation();
2779 float destx, desty, destz, ground, floor;
2780 destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2781 desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * std::sin(angle);
2782
2783 // Prevent invalid coordinates here, position is unchanged
2784 if (!Acore::IsValidMapCoord(destx, desty))
2785 {
2786 if (!disableWarning)
2787 LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "WorldObject::MovePosition invalid coordinates X: {} and Y: {} were passed!", destx, desty);
2788
2789 return;
2790 }
2791
2792 ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2793 floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2794 destz = std::fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= std::fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2795
2796 float step = dist / 10.0f;
2797
2798 for (uint8 j = 0; j < 10; ++j)
2799 {
2800 // do not allow too big z changes
2801 if (std::fabs(pos.m_positionZ - destz) > 6.0f)
2802 {
2803 destx -= step * cos(angle);
2804 desty -= step * std::sin(angle);
2805 ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2806 floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2807 destz = std::fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= std::fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2808 }
2809 // we have correct destz now
2810 else
2811 {
2812 pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);
2813 break;
2814 }
2815 }
2816
2817 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionX);
2818 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionY);
2819 UpdateGroundPositionZ(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ);
2820 pos.SetOrientation(GetOrientation());
2821}
uint8
std::uint8_t uint8

◆ MovePositionToFirstCollision()

void WorldObject::MovePositionToFirstCollision ( Position &  pos,

float  angle 
)
2861{
2862 angle += GetOrientation();
2863 float destx, desty, destz;
2864 destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2865 desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * std::sin(angle);
2866 destz = pos.m_positionZ;
2867

2869 return;
2870

2872 pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);

◆ setActive()

void WorldObject::setActive ( bool  isActiveObject)
1086{
1087 if (m_isActive == on)
1088 return;
1089
1090 if (IsPlayer())
1091 return;
1092
1093 m_isActive = on;
1094
1095 if (on && !IsInWorld())
1096 return;
1097
1098 Map* map = FindMap();
1099 if (!map)
1100 return;
1101
1102 if (on)
1103 {
1104 if (IsCreature())
1105 map->AddToActive(this->ToCreature());
1106 else if (IsDynamicObject())
1107 map->AddToActive((DynamicObject*)this);
1108 else if (IsGameObject())
1109 map->AddToActive((GameObject*)this);
1110 }
1111 else
1112 {
1113 if (IsCreature())
1114 map->RemoveFromActive(this->ToCreature());
1115 else if (IsDynamicObject())
1116 map->RemoveFromActive((DynamicObject*)this);
1117 else if (IsGameObject())
1118 map->RemoveFromActive((GameObject*)this);
1119 }
1120}

◆ SummonCreatureGroup()

void WorldObject::SummonCreatureGroup ( uint8  group,
std::list< TempSummon * > *  list = nullptr 
)

Summons group of creatures. Should be called only by instances of Creature and GameObject classes.

Parameters
groupId of group to summon.
listList to store pointers to summoned creatures.
2433{
2434 ASSERT((IsGameObject() || IsCreature()) && "Only GOs and creatures can summon npc groups!");
2435
2436 std::vector<TempSummonData> const* data = sObjectMgr->GetSummonGroup(GetEntry(), IsGameObject() ? SUMMONER_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT : SUMMONER_TYPE_CREATURE, group);
2437 if (!data)
2438 return;
2439
2440 for (std::vector<TempSummonData>::const_iterator itr = data->begin(); itr != data->end(); ++itr)
2441 if (TempSummon* summon = SummonCreature(itr->entry, itr->pos, itr->type, itr->time))
2442 if (list)
2443 list->push_back(summon);
2444}

GameObject * WorldObject::SummonGameObject ( uint32  entry,
float  x,
float  y,
float  z,
float  ang,
float  rotation0,
float  rotation1,
float  rotation2,
float  rotation3,
uint32  respawnTime,
bool  checkTransport = true,
GOSummonType  summonType = GO_SUMMON_TIMED_OR_CORPSE_DESPAWN 
)
2370{
2371 if (!IsInWorld())
2372 return nullptr;
2373
2374 GameObjectTemplate const* goinfo = sObjectMgr->GetGameObjectTemplate(entry);
2375 if (!goinfo)
2376 {
2377 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Gameobject template {} not found in database!", entry);
2378 return nullptr;
2379 }
2380
2381 Map* map = GetMap();
2382 GameObject* go = sObjectMgr->IsGameObjectStaticTransport(entry) ? new StaticTransport() : new GameObject();
2383 if (!go->Create(map->GenerateLowGuid<HighGuid::GameObject>(), entry, map, GetPhaseMask(), x, y, z, ang, G3D::Quat(rotation0, rotation1, rotation2, rotation3), 100, GO_STATE_READY))
2384 {
2385 delete go;
2386 return nullptr;
2387 }
2388
2389 go->SetRespawnTime(respawnTime);
2390
2391 // Xinef: if gameobject is temporary, set custom spellid
2392 if (respawnTime)
2393 go->SetSpellId(1);
2394
2395 if (IsPlayer() || (IsCreature() && summonType == GO_SUMMON_TIMED_OR_CORPSE_DESPAWN)) //not sure how to handle this
2396 ToUnit()->AddGameObject(go);
2397 else
2398 go->SetSpawnedByDefault(false);
2399
2400 map->AddToMap(go, checkTransport);
2401 return go;
2402}

◆ UpdateAllowedPositionZ()

void WorldObject::UpdateAllowedPositionZ ( float  x,
float  y,
float &  z,
float *  groundZ = nullptr 
) const
1555{
1556 if (GetTransport())
1557 {
1558 if (groundZ)
1559 *groundZ = z;
1560
1561 return;
1562 }
1563
1564 if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
1565 {
1566 if (!unit->CanFly())
1567 {
1568 Creature const* c = unit->ToCreature();
1569 bool canSwim = c ? c->CanSwim() : true;
1570 float ground_z = z;
1571 float max_z;
1572 if (canSwim)
1573 max_z = GetMapWaterOrGroundLevel(x, y, z, &ground_z);
1574 else
1575 max_z = ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1576
1577 if (max_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1578 {
1579 if (canSwim && unit->GetMap()->IsInWater(unit->GetPhaseMask(), x, y, max_z - Z_OFFSET_FIND_HEIGHT, unit->GetCollisionHeight()))
1580 {
1581 // do not allow creatures to walk on
1582 // water level while swimming
1583 max_z = std::max(max_z - GetMinHeightInWater(), ground_z);
1584 }
1585 else
1586 {
1587 // hovering units cannot go below their hover height
1588 float hoverOffset = unit->GetHoverHeight();
1589 max_z += hoverOffset;
1590 ground_z += hoverOffset;
1591 }
1592
1593 if (z > max_z)
1594 z = max_z;
1595 else if (z < ground_z)
1596 z = ground_z;
1597 }
1598
1599 if (groundZ)
1600 *groundZ = ground_z;
1601 }
1602 else
1603 {
1604 float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z) + unit->GetHoverHeight();
1605 if (z < ground_z)
1606 z = ground_z;
1607
1608 if (groundZ)
1609 *groundZ = ground_z;
1610 }
1611 }
1612 else
1613 {
1614 float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1615 if (ground_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1616 z = ground_z;
1617
1618 if (groundZ)
1619 *groundZ = ground_z;
1620 }
1621}
Creature::CanSwim
bool CanSwim() const override
This method check the current flag/status of a creature and its inhabit type.
Definition: Creature.cpp:3258
